CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​FileSource
abstract public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​FileSource
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​FileSources.​Folder
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Styles.​FileSource

The base class for a file source.

Multithreading: Thread Safety Notes

AddAllFiles() is the only function that is allowed to alter addAllFilesStatus.  However, other threads may read its values at any time.  Since they are all integer counters and are only used for informational purposes, no thread synchronization is necessary.

Functions

public FileSource (
Files.Manager manager
)
Validate
virtual public bool Validate (
Errors.ErrorList errors
)

Checks whether the file source is valid and adds an error to the list if not.  The default implementation simply returns true.

Contains
abstract public bool Contains (
Path file
)

Returns whether this file source contains the passed file.

MakeRelative
abstract public Path MakeRelative (
Path path
)

Converts the passed absolute path to one relative to this source.  If this source doesn't contain the path, it will return null.

MakeAbsolute
abstract public Path MakeAbsolute (
Path path
)

Converts the passed relative path to an absolute one based on this source.  This may or may not result in a path that actually maps to an existing file.

AddAllFiles
abstract public void AddAllFiles (
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Iterates through every file in the source and calls Files.Manager.AddOrUpdateFile() for each one.

GetAddAllFilesStatus
public void GetAddAllFilesStatus (
ref AddAllFilesStatus statusTarget
)

Fills the passed object with the current status of AddAllFiles().  The passed object will contain a snapshot of the status, not a continuously updating object, so the values won't change out from under you.

CombineAddAllFilesStatus
public void CombineAddAllFilesStatus (
ref AddAllFilesStatus statusTarget
)

Adds the current status numbers to the passed object.

Properties
Manager
public Files.Manager Manager { get }

The Files.Manager associated with this object.

EngineInstance
public Engine.Instance EngineInstance { get }

The Engine.Instance associated with this object.

UniqueIDString
abstract public string UniqueIDString { get }

A string that uniquely identifies this FileSource among all others of its Type, including ones based on different classes.  For example, "Folder:[path]" or "VSProject:[file]".

Type
abstract public InputType Type { get }

The type of files this FileSource provides.

Number
virtual public int Number { get }

The number assigned to this FileSource.  Only necessary to implement if Type is InputType.Source or InputType.Image.

Name
virtual public string Name { get }

The name assigned to this FileSource, or null if one hasn't been set.  Only relevant if Type is InputType.Source.

AllFilesAdded
public bool AllFilesAdded { get }

Whether all files have been added via AddAllFiles().

Claimed
public bool Claimed { get; set }

Whether the file source is claimed by a thread for processing with AddAllFiles().
